problem.markdown: The efficiency of any 2T heat engine operating between two reservoirs at distinct temperatures is the same. () True (x) False [explanation] The maximum possible efficiencies will be equal, but not the actual ones. The statement will be true only if both the engines are reversible engines. [explanation]
